chargeHist.descr: Battery or Threat to Judge, Prosecutor, or Law Enforcement Officer

result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: Battery or Threat to Judge, Prosecutor, or Law Enforcement Officer

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Paul Morgan Haskins

records.descr: Application for specific judicial assign approved

records.addlTxt: of Judge filed by Atty Nerlo

1:01 PM Defendant Paul Morgan Haskins in Court.  Attorney Adam P Nero in Court for Paul Morgan Haskins.  District Attorney Halle E. Hatch in Court for State of Wisconsin.  S/T River Falls Officer Matthew Miller.  Direct by DA Hatch.  Defendant identified.  Cross by Atty. Nero.  Redirect by DA Hatch.  Recross by Atty. Nero.  Officer excused.  State makes argument; requests Court find probable cause and bind over for trial.  Atty. Nero states argument, requests Court grant Motion to Dismiss Count One.  DA Hatch rebuts.  Court questions Attorneys.  Court makes findings; finds probable cause and binds Defendant over for trial.  Atty. Nero advises of intent to file substitution request.  Court questions proceeding with Arraignment.  Attorneys are willing to have new Judge hear.  Bond continues.  Atty. Nero requests 22TR1174 trail with 22CF173, no objection. 
 Court will allow.  Adjourned at 1:37 PM
Four Corners filed by Atty Adam Nero. To ELR for review. eif
Preliminary hearing on September 13, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
from Ct Comm Gavic to Atty Nero's letter "Request granted. Attorney Nero to contact the court and DA by 08/19/22 to schedule a Prelim. Date and time. JRG"
from Atty Nero requesting to have the STC removed from the calendar and rescheduled a preliminary hearing.

records.descr: Waiver of time limits for preliminary hearing

records.addlTxt: 3:04 PM Paul Morgan Haskins appears in custody from Jail via zoom, Atty Travis Satorius, DA Halle E. Hatch for the State of Wisconsin. Court informs Defendant of charges, possible penalties and constitutional rights. Defendant understands charges, possible penalties and constitutional rights. Waives reading. Court reviews DE's rights. DA Hatch is requesting a $10,000.00 signature bond w/conditions of absolute sobriety , Not to enter any bars, taverns or liquor stores where alcohol is the primary sales/service.  & no contact w/Officer Matthew Miller except in a professional compacity, no objection. Court so orders. DE does not qualify for PD. Waive the time lines. Court confirms address and phone number. Court adjourned at 3:13 pm.Status conference scheduled for September 26, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
Status conference on September 26, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
